title: Why Justina Blakeney Has Three Instagram Handles
sub_head: The designer and author, 42, whose latest book is ‘Jungalow: Decorate Wild,’ shares what’s on her phone.
body:
Number of unread emails
I hid that number many moons ago. It was in the 80,000s when I hid it.
Person you FaceTime most
My daughter [Ida] when she’s spending the night at Grandma’s.
First app checked in the morning
